title: Prague, Czech Republic
description: In July 2017 my wife and I visited a friend who was spending the summer in Prague for his PhD research.

photos.description: The Prague Astronomical Clock, one of the oldest functional clocks in the world.
A bunch of skull candles and other assorted bones in the Sedlec Ossuary.
More bones. It was very dark so the camera was struggling.
Karl≈°tejn Castle, built by Charles IV in the 14th century.
A sleepy Czech cat somewhere outside the castle.
